name: seg2bsml
synopsis: USAGE: seg2bsml.pl --input|-i seg.raw --seg_input_file|-s model.fsa --output|-o seg.bsml --project|-p foo --id_repository|-r /path/to/repository [ --log|-l seg2bsml.log --help --debug (currently unimplemented) ]

options.description: - The raw seg output (from a seg run using the -l option)
-s - The file used as input for seg
